# Coding Standards
https://www.coursera.org/learn/r-programming/lecture/k159q/coding-standards

1. Always use text files / text editor.
2. Indent your code.
3. Limit the width of your code (80 columns?). Suggest: indent of 4 minimum, 8 ideal.
4. Limit the length of your function.
